name: matrix_search
description: The program should either set i and j to the index of x in b or, if x isn't in b, set i to n.
precondition: n = N && m = M && x = X && 0 <= N && 0 <= M && (A qi : 0 <= qi < N : (A qj : 0 <= qj < M : b[qi][qj] = B[qi][qj]))
invariants: n = N && m = M && x = X && 0 <= i < N && 0 <= j <= M && f = 0 && (A qi : 0 <= qi < i : (A qj : 0 <= qj < M : X <> B[qi][qj])) && (A qj : 0 <= qj < j : X <> B[i][qj]) && (A qi : 0 <= qi < N : (A qj : 0 <= qj < M : b[qi][qj] = B[qi][qj]))
